info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 8:01AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nueces, west central Jim Wells and northwestern Kleberg Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 801 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ben Bolt, or 8 miles south of Alice, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsville, Driscoll, Bishop, Ben Bolt and Alice Acres. This includes the following highways... US Highway 281 between mile markers 678 and 684. US Highway 77 between mile markers 678 and 692. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
